Functions
Intersect
bool Ray3::Intersect(
Vector3 
n,
float 
d,
RayIntersect3* 
pIntersectInfo
)

Calculates the intersection of a ray with an plane. If pIntersectInfo is not nullptr then the intersection data is returned via this pointer.

Parameters
n
Vector3

normal for plane

d
float

plane offset

pIntersectInfo
RayIntersect3*

Returns the interesection info. Maybe nullptr.

Returns

True if ray interesects plane, otherwise false

Intersect
bool Ray3::Intersect(
Vector3 
p0,
Vector3 
p1,
Vector3 
p2,
RayIntersect3* 
pIntersectInfo
)

Calculates the intersection of a ray with an triangle. If pIntersectInfo is not nullptr then the intersection data is returned via this pointer.

Parameters
p0, p1, p2

coordinates for triangle's vertices

pIntersectInfo
RayIntersect3*

Returns the interesection info. Maybe nullptr.

Returns

True if ray interesects triangle, otherwise false
